job_description:
100% Remote

CAD Base Salary - $110,000 - $150,000

Must haves

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
10 years in software engineering and still want to lead by example.
Experience in building highly scalable applications
Fully versed in Agile/Scrum development processes and principles, you’ve lived its life cycle from requirements through post-deployment.
Expertise in REST APIs and back-end services, Go, React.js, Swift / Koilin, GitHub, GCP, SQL, and strong proficiency in Go Lang.
You have simplified and streamlined in a complex setting; your passion for execution excellence has made an impact.
A passion for growing talent and have focused on team building, motivating, mentoring goal setting, and career planning.
Active engagement in projects, meetups, or other activities designed to maintain your skills
Able to speak English fluently

Need Some Who

Don’t want candidates with too much job hopping
Would like candidates with some leadership experience
